Articles.Content:
Hows it going fellow aviators.

I am 'The Darkness' and I figured I would start officially hanging out in the forums.

I\'ve already downloaded most of your Plugins and Parts, the community hear is awesome.

I also hope to provide some of my skills to you guys if I get the time.

Ocassionally I like to write configuration files and do the occasional texturing.

I\'m a game modder at heart and never really got the hang of modeling so I like to play with settings and stuff.

Anyway I hope to see you guys around, maybe in low orbit. ;P

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

You couldn\'t have come at a better time, 0.15 was just released!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Happy Launching!

Thanks for the kind words, oh\' and I have.

I\'m working on a B-2 type aircraft right now.

I might need to J.A.T.O it off the ground with a solid booster. ;D

//TRANSMISSION FAILURE

/PLEASE LEAVE MESSAGE

[THIS IS SAFIRAN EMERGENCY RESPONSE SYSTEM. WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR CALL.]

//CONNECTING...

//CONNECTION REESTABLISHED

Hello there! Welcome to the Forums. I\'m RedDwarfIV, I\'m an active RPer, and I build a lot of stuff. I recommend you look at Tim_Barrett\'s ships, they are awesome. Also, my aerospace company - \'Veto Aerospace [VA]\' - produces a lot of designs no one else bothers with.
